 1	# Full Player Screen - UI Implementation
 2	
 3	## Overview
 4	This implementation provides a complete Full Player Screen UI for the Soundify Music Player app, following Apple-like design principles with clean typography, generous whitespace, and intuitive interactions.
 5	
 6	## Features Implemented
 7	
 8	### **Header Section**
 9	- Song title with large, prominent text
 10	- Artist/uploader name with secondary styling
 11	- Minimize/collapse button (functional)
 12	- Follow/Unfollow button with state management
 13	
 14	### ️ **Album Art Section**
 15	- Large, centered album artwork placeholder
 16	- Rounded corners with subtle shadow
 17	- Responsive sizing (280dp)
 18	
 19	### **Playback Controls**
 20	- Previous/Next track buttons
 21	- Large, central Play/Pause button with state changes
 22	- Interactive progress bar with seek functionality
 23	- Current time and total duration display
 24	- **Mock playback simulation** - progress updates in real-time when playing
 25	
 26	### **Comment Input**
 27	- Clean text input field with placeholder
 28	- Send functionality with toast feedback
 29	- Apple-like styling with rounded corners
 30	
 31	### **Bottom Action Bar**
 32	- Heart/Like button with filled/unfilled states
 33	- Comment count/view button
 34	- Add to playlist button
 35	- Queue/up next button
 36	- Proper spacing and touch targets
 37	
 38	## Design System
 39	
 40	### **Colors**
 41	- **Primary Background**: Clean white (#FFFFFF)
 42	- **Text Primary**: Dark gray (#1C1C1E)
 43	- **Text Secondary**: Medium gray (#8E8E93)
 44	- **Accent Blue**: iOS-style blue (#007AFF)
 45	- **Like Active**: Red (#FF3B30)
 46	
 47	### **Spacing**
 48	- Consistent 8dp grid system
 49	- Generous whitespace following Apple guidelines
 50	- Proper touch targets (44dp minimum)
 51	
 52	### **Typography**
 53	- Large title: 34sp
 54	- Headlines: 17sp
 55	- Body text: 17sp
 56	- Captions: 12-13sp
 57	
 58	## Mock Data Features
 59	
 60	### **Sample Content**
 61	- **Song**: "Beautiful Sunset" (3:45 duration)
 62	- **Artist**: "Ambient Artist"
 63	- **Genre**: Ambient
 64	- **Description**: Relaxing instrumental track
 65	
 66	### ⚡ **Interactive Features**
 67	- **Play/Pause**: Toggles playback state with progress simulation
 68	- **Like**: Toggles heart icon between filled/unfilled states
 69	- **Follow**: Toggles button text between "Follow" and "Following"
 70	- **Progress Bar**: Interactive seeking with time updates
 71	- **Comments**: Input field with success feedback
 72	
 73	## How to Test
 74	
 75	### **Quick Start**
 76	1. Run the app
 77	2. Login with credentials: `admin` / `123`
 78	3. The app will automatically navigate to the Full Player Screen
 79	
 80	### **Testing Interactions**
 81	- **Tap Play**: Watch progress bar animate and time update
 82	- **Tap Heart**: See like state change with visual feedback
 83	- **Tap Follow**: Toggle follow status with button text change
 84	- **Drag Progress Bar**: Seek to different positions
 85	- **Type Comment**: Press enter to see success message
 86	- **Tap Minimize**: Returns to previous screen
 87	
 88	## File Structure
 89	
 90	```
 91	app/src/main/
 92	├── java/com/g3/soundify_musicplayer/ui/player/
 93	│ ├── FullPlayerFragment.java # Main UI logic
 94	│ ├── FullPlayerViewModel.java # Mock data & state management
 95	│ └── PlayerDemoActivity.java # Demo container activity
 96	├── res/layout/
 97	│ ├── fragment_full_player.xml # Main layout
 98	│ └── activity_player_demo.xml # Demo activity layout
 99	├── res/drawable/
 100	│ ├── ic_*.xml # All player icons
 101	│ ├── button_*.xml # Button backgrounds
 102	│ └── placeholder_album_art.xml # Album art placeholder
 103	├── res/values/
 104	│ ├── colors.xml # Apple-like color scheme
 105	│ ├── dimens.xml # Consistent spacing values
 106	│ └── strings.xml # All text resources
 107	```
 108	
 109	## Architecture
 110	
 111	### ️ **MVVM Pattern**
 112	- **Fragment**: UI logic and user interactions
 113	- **ViewModel**: State management with mock data
 114	- **LiveData**: Reactive UI updates
 115	- **No Backend**: Pure UI implementation for testing
 116	
 117	### **State Management**
 118	- Play/pause state with progress simulation
 119	- Like/unlike with visual feedback
 120	- Follow/unfollow with button text changes
 121	- Real-time progress updates during playback
 122	
 123	## Key Benefits
 124	
 125	### ✅ **Clean Architecture**
 126	- Separation of concerns
 127	- Reusable components
 128	- Easy to extend with real backend
 129	
 130	### ✅ **Apple-like UX**
 131	- Intuitive interactions
 132	- Smooth state transitions
 133	- Consistent visual hierarchy
 134	
 135	### ✅ **Developer Friendly**
 136	- Mock data for easy testing
 137	- Clear component structure
 138	- Comprehensive documentation
 139	
 140	## Next Steps
 141	
 142	When ready to integrate with backend:
 143	1. Replace mock data in `FullPlayerViewModel`
 144	2. Integrate with Media3 ExoPlayer
 145	3. Connect to Room database
 146	4. Add image loading with Glide/Coil
 147	5. Implement real comment system
 148	
 149	---
 150	
 151	**Note**: This is a UI-only implementation with mock data for testing purposes. No backend integration is included to focus on the user interface and interactions.

 1	# Dự án Android Music Player (PRM391) – Đặc tả
 2	
 3	**Màn hình & Phạm vi CRUD**
 4	
 5	**Mục tiêu:** Xây dựng app Android (Java, API 30-35) mô phỏng kiểu SoundCloud tối giản cho sinh viên PRM391: người dùng có thể đăng nhạc, nghe nhạc của người khác, comment (không reply), like comment, tạo & quản lý playlist, lưu bài hát vào playlist, follow user khác.
 6	
 7	**Phạm vi:** Ưu tiên CRUD rõ ràng, dễ chấm điểm, dễ demo offline (có thể mô phỏng backend bằng SQLite/Room + mock file URL nội bộ). Có thể mở rộng backend REST/Spring Boot về sau.
 8

 18	| 2 | Backend | Bản base: SQLite/Room local để dễ demo offline. | Mở rộng: Spring Boot REST + Retrofit sync. |

 20	| 4 | Upload nhạc | Người dùng chọn file (MP3), nhập metadata: title, description, genre, visibility (public/ unlisted). | Có thể phân tích ID3, upload chunk. |

 414	## 11\. Thành phần Kỹ thuật Chính

 1	# Upload/Edit Song Screen Documentation
 2	
 3	## Tổng quan
 4	
 5	Màn hình Upload/Edit Song cho phép người dùng tải lên bài hát mới hoặc chỉnh sửa bài hát đã có. Màn hình này được thiết kế theo kiến trúc MVVM và tích hợp hoàn toàn với hệ thống Room database của ứng dụng.
 6	
 7	### ️ Kiến trúc tổng thể
 8	
 9	```
 10	┌─────────────────────┐ ┌─────────────────────┐ ┌─────────────────────┐
 11	│ UploadSongActivity│────│ UploadSongViewModel │────│ SongRepository │
 12	│ (View Layer) │ │ (ViewModel Layer) │ │ (Data Layer) │
 13	└─────────────────────┘ └─────────────────────┘ └─────────────────────┘
 14	 │ │ │
 15	 │ │ │
 16	 ▼ ▼ ▼
 17	┌─────────────────────┐ ┌─────────────────────┐ ┌─────────────────────┐
 18	│ UI Components │ │ LiveData │ │ Room Database │
 19	│ (Material Design) │ │ Observers │ │ (SQLite) │
 20	└─────────────────────┘ └─────────────────────┘ └─────────────────────┘
 21	```
 22	
 23	## Chức năng chính
 24	
 25	### 1. Upload bài hát mới
 26	
 27	**Flow hoạt động:**
 28	1. Người dùng chọn file audio (.mp3) từ device storage
 29	2. Tùy chọn chọn ảnh bìa cho bài hát
 30	3. Nhập metadata: title, description, genre, visibility
 31	4. Hệ thống validate input data
 32	5. Copy files vào internal storage
 33	6. Tạo Song entity và lưu vào Room database
 34	7. Hiển thị success message và đóng màn hình
 35	
 36	**Code example:**
 37	```java
 38	// Khởi tạo màn hình upload
 39	Intent intent = UploadSongActivity.createUploadIntent(this);
 40	startActivity(intent);
 41	```
 42	
 43	### 2. Edit bài hát hiện có
 44	
 45	**Flow hoạt động:**
 46	1. Load dữ liệu bài hát từ database theo songId
 47	2. Populate các trường input với dữ liệu hiện có
 48	3. Cho phép người dùng cập nhật thông tin
 49	4. Validate và save changes vào database
 50	5. Hiển thị nút Delete để xóa bài hát
 51	
 52	**Code example:**
 53	```java
 54	// Khởi tạo màn hình edit
 55	Intent intent = UploadSongActivity.createEditIntent(this, songId);
 56	startActivity(intent);
 57	```
 58	
 59	### 3. Delete bài hát
 60	
 61	**Flow hoạt động:**
 62	1. Hiển thị confirmation dialog
 63	2. Nếu user xác nhận, xóa bài hát khỏi database
 64	3. Xóa các files liên quan (audio, cover art)
 65	4. Hiển thị success message và đóng màn hình
 66	
 67	## ️ Code Structure
 68	
 69	### UploadSongActivity.java
 70	**Vai trò:** View layer - Quản lý UI và user interactions
 71	
 72	**Thành phần chính:**
 73	- UI components initialization với findViewById
 74	- ActivityResultLauncher cho file selection
 75	- LiveData observers cho state management
 76	- Input validation và error handling
 77	
 78	```java
 79	public class UploadSongActivity extends AppCompatActivity {
 80	 private UploadSongViewModel viewModel;
 81	 
 82	 // UI components
 83	 private ShapeableImageView imageViewCoverArt;
 84	 private Button buttonSelectAudio;
 85	 private TextInputEditText editTextTitle;
 86	 // ... other UI components
 87	 
 88	 // File selection launchers
 89	 private ActivityResultLauncher<Intent> audioPickerLauncher;
 90	 private ActivityResultLauncher<Intent> imagePickerLauncher;
 91	}
 92	```
 93	
 94	### UploadSongViewModel.java
 95	**Vai trò:** ViewModel layer - Business logic và state management
 96	
 97	**Thành phần chính:**
 98	- Repository integration
 99	- LiveData cho UI state
 100	- Background operations với ExecutorService
 101	- Input validation logic
 102	
 103	```java
 104	public class UploadSongViewModel extends AndroidViewModel {
 105	 private final SongRepository songRepository;
 106	 private final AuthManager authManager;
 107	 
 108	 // LiveData for UI state
 109	 private final MutableLiveData<Song> currentSong;
 110	 private final MutableLiveData<Boolean> isEditMode;
 111	 private final MutableLiveData<Boolean> isLoading;
 112	 private final MutableLiveData<String> errorMessage;
 113	}
 114	```
 115	
 116	### FileUtils.java
 117	**Vai trò:** Utility class - File operations và metadata extraction
 118	
 119	**Chức năng:**
 120	- Copy files từ external storage vào internal storage
 121	- Extract file name và size từ URI
 122	- Get audio duration với MediaMetadataRetriever
 123	- File validation (audio/image types)
 124	
 125	```java
 126	public class FileUtils {
 127	 public static String copyFileToInternalStorage(Context context, Uri sourceUri, String fileName);
 128	 public static long getAudioDuration(Context context, Uri audioUri);
 129	 public static String getFileName(Context context, Uri uri);
 130	 public static boolean isValidAudioFile(Context context, Uri audioUri);
 131	}
 132	```
 133	
 134	## UI Components
 135	
 136	### Layout Structure (activity_upload_song.xml)
 137	```xml
 138	ScrollView
 139	└── ConstraintLayout
 140	 ├── ShapeableImageView (Cover Art)
 141	 ├── Button (Select Audio File)
 142	 ├── TextInputLayout (Title)
 143	 ├── TextInputLayout (Description)
 144	 ├── TextInputLayout (Genre Dropdown)
 145	 ├── MaterialSwitch (Visibility)
 146	 └── LinearLayout (Save/Delete Buttons)
 147	```
 148	
 149	### Material Design Components
 150	- **ShapeableImageView**: Cover art với rounded corners
 151	- **TextInputLayout**: Outlined style cho consistent design
 152	- **AutoCompleteTextView**: Genre selection dropdown
 153	- **MaterialSwitch**: Public/Private visibility toggle

 220	// PlaylistSongAdapter.java - moveItem()
 221	public void moveItem(int fromPosition, int toPosition) {
 222	 if (fromPosition < toPosition) {
 223	 for (int i = fromPosition; i < toPosition; i++) {
 224	 Collections.swap(songs, i, i + 1);
 225	 }
 226	 } else {
 227	 for (int i = fromPosition; i > toPosition; i--) {
 228	 Collections.swap(songs, i, i - 1);
 229	 }
 230	 }
 231	 notifyItemMoved(fromPosition, toPosition);
 232	 
 233	 if (listener != null) {
 234	 listener.onMoveSong(fromPosition, toPosition);
 235	 }
 236	}

 253	 } else if (itemId == R.id.action_move_up) {
 254	 if (position > 0) {

 256	 }
 257	 return true;
 258	 } else if (itemId == R.id.action_move_down) {
 259	 if (position < songs.size() - 1) {
 260	 moveItem(position, position + 1);
 261	 }
 262	 return true;
 263	 }
 264	 return false;
 265	 });

 385	## Key Design Patterns
 386	
 387	### 1. **MVVM Pattern**
 388	- **View**: Activity handles UI and user interactions
 389	- **ViewModel**: Manages business logic and data state
 390	- **Model**: Repository and Room entities
 391	
 392	### 2. **Observer Pattern**
 393	- LiveData observers for reactive UI updates
 394	- Automatic UI refresh when data changes
 395	
 396	### 3. **Adapter Pattern**
 397	- RecyclerView.Adapter bridges data and UI
 398	- ViewHolder pattern for efficient view recycling
 399	
 400	### 4. **Strategy Pattern**
 401	- Different UI behavior based on ownership
 402	- Conditional visibility and functionality

 406	### 1. **Efficient RecyclerView**
 407	- ViewHolder pattern prevents findViewById() calls

## **Soundify Music Player - Complete Codebase Overview**

### ️ **Project Architecture**

The project follows **MVVM (Model-View-ViewModel)** architecture with **Repository pattern** and uses **Room database** for local storage. It's designed as a SoundCloud-like music streaming app for Android.

### **Core Features & Functionality**

#### **1. Authentication System**
- **Login/Register**: Simple credential-based authentication
- **Session Management**: SharedPreferences-based user sessions
- **Password Security**: SHA-256 hashing for passwords
- **Demo Credentials**: `admin/123` for quick testing

#### **2. Music Player Features**
- **Full Player Screen**: Apple-like design with mock playback simulation
- **Playback Controls**: Play/pause, previous/next, seek bar
- **Progress Tracking**: Real-time progress updates during playback
- **Like/Unlike**: Heart button with state management
- **Follow/Unfollow**: Artist following functionality

#### **3. Song Management**
- **Upload Songs**: File selection, metadata input, cover art
- **Edit/Delete**: Full CRUD operations for user's songs
- **File Storage**: Internal storage for audio files and cover art
- **Validation**: Title, description, genre, and file format validation

#### **4. Playlist System**
- **Create/Edit Playlists**: Full playlist management
- **Add/Remove Songs**: Drag-and-drop reordering
- **Playlist Detail**: Owner-based UI with different permissions
- **Song Selection**: Multi-select interface for adding songs

#### **5. User Profiles**
- **Public Profiles**: View other users' songs and playlists
- **Follow System**: Follow/unfollow other users
- **Stats Display**: Followers, following, songs count
- **Profile Editing**: Update user information

#### **6. Social Features**
- **Comments**: Add comments to songs (no replies)
- **Comment Likes**: Like/unlike comments
- **User Following**: Follow other users for content discovery

### ️ **Project Structure**

## **Soundify Music Player - Complete Codebase Overview**

### ️ **Project Architecture**

The project follows **MVVM (Model-View-ViewModel)** architecture with **Repository pattern** and uses **Room database** for local storage. It's designed as a SoundCloud-like music streaming app for Android.

### **Core Features & Functionality**

#### **1. Authentication System**
- **Login/Register**: Simple credential-based authentication
- **Session Management**: SharedPreferences-based user sessions
- **Password Security**: SHA-256 hashing for passwords
- **Demo Credentials**: `admin/123` for quick testing

#### **2. Music Player Features**
- **Full Player Screen**: Apple-like design with mock playback simulation
- **Playback Controls**: Play/pause, previous/next, seek bar
- **Progress Tracking**: Real-time progress updates during playback
- **Like/Unlike**: Heart button with state management
- **Follow/Unfollow**: Artist following functionality

#### **3. Song Management**
- **Upload Songs**: File selection, metadata input, cover art
- **Edit/Delete**: Full CRUD operations for user's songs
- **File Storage**: Internal storage for audio files and cover art
- **Validation**: Title, description, genre, and file format validation

#### **4. Playlist System**
- **Create/Edit Playlists**: Full playlist management
- **Add/Remove Songs**: Drag-and-drop reordering
- **Playlist Detail**: Owner-based UI with different permissions
- **Song Selection**: Multi-select interface for adding songs

#### **5. User Profiles**
- **Public Profiles**: View other users' songs and playlists
- **Follow System**: Follow/unfollow other users
- **Stats Display**: Followers, following, songs count
- **Profile Editing**: Update user information

#### **6. Social Features**
- **Comments**: Add comments to songs (no replies)
- **Comment Likes**: Like/unlike comments
- **User Following**: Follow other users for content discovery

## **Soundify Music Player - Complete Codebase Overview**

### ️ **Project Architecture**

The project follows **MVVM (Model-View-ViewModel)** architecture with **Repository pattern** and uses **Room database** for local storage. It's designed as a SoundCloud-like music streaming app for Android.

### **Core Features & Functionality**

#### **1. Authentication System**
- **Login/Register**: Simple credential-based authentication
- **Session Management**: SharedPreferences-based user sessions
- **Password Security**: SHA-256 hashing for passwords
- **Demo Credentials**: `admin/123` for quick testing

#### **2. Music Player Features**
- **Full Player Screen**: Apple-like design with mock playback simulation
- **Playback Controls**: Play/pause, previous/next, seek bar
- **Progress Tracking**: Real-time progress updates during playback
- **Like/Unlike**: Heart button with state management
- **Follow/Unfollow**: Artist following functionality

#### **3. Song Management**
- **Upload Songs**: File selection, metadata input, cover art
- **Edit/Delete**: Full CRUD operations for user's songs
- **File Storage**: Internal storage for audio files and cover art
- **Validation**: Title, description, genre, and file format validation

#### **4. Playlist System**
- **Create/Edit Playlists**: Full playlist management
- **Add/Remove Songs**: Drag-and-drop reordering
- **Playlist Detail**: Owner-based UI with different permissions
- **Song Selection**: Multi-select interface for adding songs

#### **5. User Profiles**
- **Public Profiles**: View other users' songs and playlists
- **Follow System**: Follow/unfollow other users
- **Stats Display**: Followers, following, songs count
- **Profile Editing**: Update user information

#### **6. Social Features**
- **Comments**: Add comments to songs (no replies)
- **Comment Likes**: Like/unlike comments
- **User Following**: Follow other users for content discovery

### ️ **Project Structure**

```` path=app/src/main/java/com/g3/soundify_musicplayer mode=EXCERPT
soundify_musicplayer/
├── MainActivity.java # Main container with bottom navigation
├── SplashActivity.java # App launch screen
├── data/
│ ├── Activity/
│ │ ├── LoginActivity.java # Authentication
│ │ └── RegisterActivity.java # User registration
│ ├── Fragment/
│ │ └── HomeFragment.java # Home feed with songs/playlists
│ ├── Adapter/ # RecyclerView adapters
│ ├── dao/ # Room database access objects
│ ├── entity/ # Database entities
│ ├── database/
│ │ └── AppDatabase.java # Room database configuration
│ └── repository/ # Data access layer
├── ui/
│ ├── player/ # Full player implementation
│ ├── playlist/ # Playlist management
│ ├── profile/ # User profiles
│ └── upload/ # Song upload functionality
└── utils/ # Utility classes
````

### **Key Components**

#### **Database Entities**
- **User**: Authentication and profile data
- **Song**: Audio files with metadata
- **Playlist**: User-created playlists
- **PlaylistSong**: Many-to-many relationship
- **Comment**: Song comments
- **CommentLike**: Comment likes
- **UserFollow**: User following relationships
- **SongLike**: Song likes

#### **UI Components**
- **MainActivity**: Bottom navigation container
- **HomeFragment**: Main feed with recent songs and playlists
- **FullPlayerFragment**: Complete music player interface
- **PlaylistDetailActivity**: Playlist management with drag-drop
- **UploadSongActivity**: Song upload/edit functionality
- **UserProfileActivity**: User profile display
- **SelectSongsActivity**: Multi-select song picker

#### **Data Flow**
```
UI Layer (Activities/Fragments) 
 ↓ (LiveData Observers)
ViewModel Layer (Business Logic)
 ↓ (Repository Pattern)
Repository Layer (Data Access)
 ↓ (Room DAOs)
Database Layer (SQLite)
```

### ️ **Technical Stack**

#### **Core Technologies**
- **Language**: Java
- **Architecture**: MVVM + Repository Pattern
- **Database**: Room (SQLite)
- **UI**: Material Design 3
- **Image Loading**: Glide
- **Async Operations**: ExecutorService + LiveData

#### **Key Dependencies**
````kotlin path=app/build.gradle.kts mode=EXCERPT
dependencies {
 implementation("androidx.room:room-runtime:2.7.2")
 annotationProcessor("androidx.room:room-compiler:2.7.2")
 implementation("com.google.android.material:material:1.11.0")
 implementation("com.github.bumptech.glide:glide:4.16.0")
 // ... other dependencies
}
````

### **UI Design System**

#### **Material Design Features**
- **CollapsingToolbarLayout**: Parallax scrolling effects
- **BottomNavigationView**: Main app navigation
- **FloatingActionButton**: Primary actions
- **ShapeableImageView**: Rounded corners for images
- **Material Buttons**: Consistent button styling
- **TextInputLayout**: Outlined input fields

#### **Color Scheme**
- **Primary**: iOS-style blue (#007AFF)
- **Background**: Clean white (#FFFFFF)
- **Text Primary**: Dark gray (#1C1C1E)
- **Text Secondary**: Medium gray (#8E8E93)
- **Accent**: Red for likes (#FF3B30)

### **Current Implementation Status**

#### **✅ Completed Features**
- Complete database schema with Room
- Authentication system with session management
- Full player UI with mock data
- Song upload/edit functionality
- Playlist detail with drag-drop
- User profile system
- Material Design UI components

#### ** In Progress/TODO**
- Real audio playback with ExoPlayer
- Search functionality
- Library fragment implementation
- Comment system integration
- Image loading optimization
- Backend API integration

### **Documentation**

The project includes comprehensive documentation:
- **SRS.md**: Complete system requirements specification
- **FULL_PLAYER_README.md**: Full player implementation details
- **UPLOAD_SONG_DOCUMENTATION.md**: Upload functionality guide
- **PLAYLIST_DETAIL_FUNCTIONALITY.md**: Playlist management details
- **SELECT_SONGS_FUNCTIONALITY.md**: Song selection interface

### **Key Design Patterns**

1. **MVVM Pattern**: Clear separation of UI, business logic, and data
2. **Repository Pattern**: Centralized data access
3. **Observer Pattern**: LiveData for reactive UI updates
4. **Singleton Pattern**: Database instance management
5. **Adapter Pattern**: RecyclerView data binding

### **Performance Considerations**

- **Background Operations**: All database operations on background threads
- **Memory Management**: Proper cleanup in ViewModels
- **Efficient RecyclerViews**: ViewHolder pattern with optimized binding
- **Image Caching**: Glide for efficient image loading
- **LiveData**: Automatic lifecycle-aware updates

This codebase represents a well-structured Android music player application with modern architecture patterns, comprehensive functionality, and room for future enhancements like real audio playback and cloud integration.

 30	 try (Cursor cursor = context.getContentResolver().query(uri, null, null, null, null)) {
 31	 if (cursor != null && cursor.moveToFirst()) {
 32	 int nameIndex = cursor.getColumnIndex(OpenableColumns.DISPLAY_NAME);
 33	 if (nameIndex != -1) {

 35	 }
 36	 }

 39	 }
 40	 }
 41	 
 42	 if (fileName == null) {
 43	 fileName = uri.getPath();
 44	 if (fileName != null) {
 45	 int cut = fileName.lastIndexOf('/');
 46	 if (cut != -1) {
 47	 fileName = fileName.substring(cut + 1);
 48	 }
 49	 }
 50	 }
 51	 
 52	 return fileName != null ? fileName : "unknown_file";

 346	 */
 347	 private String getFileName(Uri uri) {
 348	 String fileName = null;
 349	 
 350	 if (uri.getScheme().equals("content")) {
 351	 try (Cursor cursor = getContentResolver().query(uri, null, null, null, null)) {
 352	 if (cursor != null && cursor.moveToFirst()) {
 353	 int nameIndex = cursor.getColumnIndex(OpenableColumns.DISPLAY_NAME);
 354	 if (nameIndex != -1) {
 355	 fileName = cursor.getString(nameIndex);
 356	 }
 357	 }
 358	 } catch (Exception e) {
 359	 // Ignore errors
 360	 }
 361	 }
 362	 
 363	 if (fileName == null) {
 364	 fileName = uri.getPath();
 365	 if (fileName != null) {
 366	 int cut = fileName.lastIndexOf('/');
 367	 if (cut != -1) {
 368	 fileName = fileName.substring(cut + 1);
 369	 }
 370	 }
 371	 }
 372	 
 373	 return fileName != null ? fileName : "audio_file.mp3";
 374	 }

followingIds.remove(userId);\n }\n \n // Update specific item\n for (int i = 0; i < filteredUsers.size(); i++) {\n if (filteredUsers.get(i).getId() == userId) {\n notifyItemChanged(i);\n break;\n }\n  103	## 3\. Sơ đồ Quan hệ (ER – mô tả chữ)
 104	
 105	- **User (1) -\< Song(N)**: \#1 user upload nhiều bài hát
 106	- **User (1) -\< Playlist(N)**: \#1 user có nhiều playlist
 107	- **Playlist(N) \>\< Song (N)**: \# qua PlaylistSong
 108	- **User (N) \>\< User (N)**: \# Follow (followerId -\> followeeId)
 109	- **Song(1) \< Comment(N)**: \# nhiều comment trên 1 bài hát
 110	- **Comment(N) \>\< User (N)**: \# Like comment qua CommentLike
 111

 113	
 114	## 4\. Kiến trúc Điều hướng Tổng thể
 115	
 116	App theo pattern 1 `Activity` (MainActivity) + nhiều `Fragment` (Home, Search, Library, Profile...) với `BottomNavigationView`.
 117	
 118	**Thanh điều hướng đáy (Bottom Nav Tabs):**
 119	
 120	1. **Home** - feed bài hát mới / từ người theo dõi.
 121	2. **Search** - tìm bài hát, user, playlist.
 122	3. **Library** - nhạc của tôi (My Songs, My Playlists, Liked/Mục đã lưu).
 123	
 124	**Mini Player** cố định ở dưới (trên BottomNav) hoặc dạng bottom sheet expandable sang màn hình Player full.
 125	
 126	**Auth (Login/Register)** nằm trước `MainActivity` (Activity riêng).
 127	
 128	-----

 131

 1	# Full Player Screen - UI Implementation
 2	
 3	## Overview
 4	This implementation provides a complete Full Player Screen UI for the Soundify Music Player app, following Apple-like design principles with clean typography, generous whitespace, and intuitive interactions.
 5	
 6	## Features Implemented
 7	
 8	### **Header Section**
 9	- Song title with large, prominent text
 10	- Artist/uploader name with secondary styling
 11	- Minimize/collapse button (functional)
 12	- Follow/Unfollow button with state management
 13	
 14	### ️ **Album Art Section**
 15	- Large, centered album artwork placeholder
 16	- Rounded corners with subtle shadow
 17	- Responsive sizing (280dp)
 18	
 19	### **Playback Controls**
 20	- Previous/Next track buttons
 21	- Large, central Play/Pause button with state changes
 22	- Interactive progress bar with seek functionality
 23	- Current time and total duration display
 24	- **Mock playback simulation** - progress updates in real-time when playing
 25	
 26	### **Comment Input**
 27	- Clean text input field with placeholder
 28	- Send functionality with toast feedback
 29	- Apple-like styling with rounded corners
 30	
 31	### **Bottom Action Bar**
 32	- Heart/Like button with filled/unfilled states
 33	- Comment count/view button
 34	- Add to playlist button
 35	- Queue/up next button
 36	- Proper spacing and touch targets
 37	
 38	## Design System
 39	
 40	### **Colors**
 41	- **Primary Background**: Clean white (#FFFFFF)
 42	- **Text Primary**: Dark gray (#1C1C1E)
 43	- **Text Secondary**: Medium gray (#8E8E93)
 44	- **Accent Blue**: iOS-style blue (#007AFF)
 45	- **Like Active**: Red (#FF3B30)
 46	
 47	### **Spacing**
 48	- Consistent 8dp grid system
 49	- Generous whitespace following Apple guidelines
 50	- Proper touch targets (44dp minimum)
 51	
 52	### **Typography**
 53	- Large title: 34sp
 54	- Headlines: 17sp
 55	- Body text: 17sp
 56	- Captions: 12-13sp
 57	
 58	## Mock Data Features
 59	
 60	### **Sample Content**
 61	- **Song**: "Beautiful Sunset" (3:45 duration)
 62	- **Artist**: "Ambient Artist"
 63	- **Genre**: Ambient
 64	- **Description**: Relaxing instrumental track
 65	
 66	### ⚡ **Interactive Features**
 67	- **Play/Pause**: Toggles playback state with progress simulation
 68	- **Like**: Toggles heart icon between filled/unfilled states
 69	- **Follow**: Toggles button text between "Follow" and "Following"
 70	- **Progress Bar**: Interactive seeking with time updates
 71	- **Comments**: Input field with success feedback
 72	
 73	## How to Test
 74	
 75	### **Quick Start**
 76	1. Run the app
 77	2. Login with credentials: `admin` / `123`
 78	3. The app will automatically navigate to the Full Player Screen
 79	
 80	### **Testing Interactions**
 81	- **Tap Play**: Watch progress bar animate and time update
 82	- **Tap Heart**: See like state change with visual feedback
 83	- **Tap Follow**: Toggle follow status with button text change
 84	- **Drag Progress Bar**: Seek to different positions
 85	- **Type Comment**: Press enter to see success message
 86	- **Tap Minimize**: Returns to previous screen
 87	
 88	## File Structure
 89	
 90	```
 91	app/src/main/
 92	├── java/com/g3/soundify_musicplayer/ui/player/
 93	│ ├── FullPlayerFragment.java # Main UI logic
 94	│ ├── FullPlayerViewModel.java # Mock data & state management
 95	│ └── PlayerDemoActivity.java # Demo container activity
 96	├── res/layout/
 97	│ ├── fragment_full_player.xml # Main layout
 98	│ └── activity_player_demo.xml # Demo activity layout
 99	├── res/drawable/
 100	│ ├── ic_*.xml # All player icons
 101	│ ├── button_*.xml # Button backgrounds
 102	│ └── placeholder_album_art.xml # Album art placeholder
 103	├── res/values/
 104	│ ├── colors.xml # Apple-like color scheme
 105	│ ├── dimens.xml # Consistent spacing values
 106	│ └── strings.xml # All text resources
 107	```
 108	
 109	## Architecture
 110	
 111	### ️ **MVVM Pattern**
 112	- **Fragment**: UI logic and user interactions
 113	- **ViewModel**: State management with mock data
 114	- **LiveData**: Reactive UI updates
 115	- **No Backend**: Pure UI implementation for testing
 116	
 117	### **State Management**
 118	- Play/pause state with progress simulation
 119	- Like/unlike with visual feedback
 120	- Follow/unfollow with button text changes
 121	- Real-time progress updates during playback
 122	
 123	## Key Benefits
 124	
 125	### ✅ **Clean Architecture**
 126	- Separation of concerns
 127	- Reusable components
 128	- Easy to extend with real backend
 129	
 130	### ✅ **Apple-like UX**
 131	- Intuitive interactions
 132	- Smooth state transitions
 133	- Consistent visual hierarchy
 134	
 135	### ✅ **Developer Friendly**
 136	- Mock data for easy testing
 137	- Clear component structure
 138	- Comprehensive documentation

 1	# Upload/Edit Song Screen Documentation
 2	
 3	## Tổng quan
 4	
 5	Màn hình Upload/Edit Song cho phép người dùng tải lên bài hát mới hoặc chỉnh sửa bài hát đã có. Màn hình này được thiết kế theo kiến trúc MVVM và tích hợp hoàn toàn với hệ thống Room database của ứng dụng.
 6	
 7	### ️ Kiến trúc tổng thể
 8	
 9	```
 10	┌─────────────────────┐ ┌─────────────────────┐ ┌─────────────────────┐
 11	│ UploadSongActivity│────│ UploadSongViewModel │────│ SongRepository │
 12	│ (View Layer) │ │ (ViewModel Layer) │ │ (Data Layer) │
 13	└─────────────────────┘ └─────────────────────┘ └─────────────────────┘
 14	 │ │ │
 15	 │ │ │
 16	 ▼ ▼ ▼
 17	┌─────────────────────┐ ┌─────────────────────┐ ┌─────────────────────┐
 18	│ UI Components │ │ LiveData │ │ Room Database │
 19	│ (Material Design) │ │ Observers │ │ (SQLite) │
 20	└─────────────────────┘ └─────────────────────┘ └─────────────────────┘
 21	```
 22	
 23	## Chức năng chính
 24	
 25	### 1. Upload bài hát mới
 26	
 27	**Flow hoạt động:**
 28	1. Người dùng chọn file audio (.mp3) từ device storage
 29	2. Tùy chọn chọn ảnh bìa cho bài hát
 30	3. Nhập metadata: title, description, genre, visibility
 31	4. Hệ thống validate input data
 32	5. Copy files vào internal storage
 33	6. Tạo Song entity và lưu vào Room database
 34	7. Hiển thị success message và đóng màn hình
 35	
 36	**Code example:**
 37	```java
 38	// Khởi tạo màn hình upload
 39	Intent intent = UploadSongActivity.createUploadIntent(this);
 40	startActivity(intent);
 41	```
 42	
 43	### 2. Edit bài hát hiện có
 44	
 45	**Flow hoạt động:**
 46	1. Load dữ liệu bài hát từ database theo songId
 47	2. Populate các trường input với dữ liệu hiện có
 48	3. Cho phép người dùng cập nhật thông tin
 49	4. Validate và save changes vào database
 50	5. Hiển thị nút Delete để xóa bài hát
 51	
 52	**Code example:**
 53	```java
 54	// Khởi tạo màn hình edit
 55	Intent intent = UploadSongActivity.createEditIntent(this, songId);
 56	startActivity(intent);
 57	```
 58	
 59	### 3. Delete bài hát
 60	
 61	**Flow hoạt động:**
 62	1. Hiển thị confirmation dialog
 63	2. Nếu user xác nhận, xóa bài hát khỏi database
 64	3. Xóa các files liên quan (audio, cover art)
 65	4. Hiển thị success message và đóng màn hình
 66

 156	## LiveData Observers
 157	
 158	### State Management
 159	```java
 160	// Edit mode observer
 161	viewModel.getIsEditMode().observe(this, isEditMode -> {
 162	 updateUIForMode(isEditMode);
 163	});

 180	## File Handling
 181	
 182	### Audio File Selection
 183	```java
 184	private void selectAudioFile() {
 185	 Intent intent = new Intent(Intent.ACTION_OPEN_DOCUMENT);
 186	 intent.addCategory(Intent.CATEGORY_OPENABLE);
 187	 intent.setType("audio/*");
 188	 audioPickerLauncher.launch(intent);
 189	}
 190	```

 192	### File Storage Strategy
 193	1. **External Storage**: User selects files từ device storage
 194	2. **Internal Storage**: App copies files vào private directory
 195	3. **Database**: Lưu internal file paths trong Song entity
 196	4. **Cleanup**: Xóa files khi delete bài hát

 201	├── audio/
 202	│ ├── song_audio_1.mp3
 203	│ ├── song_audio_2.mp3
 204	│ └── ...

 207	 ├── cover_image_2.png
 208	 └── ...

 211	## ✅ Validation Rules
 212	
 213	### Input Validation
 214	- **Title**: Required, max 100 characters
 215	- **Description**: Optional, max 500 characters
 216	- **Audio File**: Required for new songs
 217	- **Genre**: Selected from predefined list
 218	- **Cover Art**: Optional, image files only
 219	
 220	### Error Messages
 221	```java
 222	private boolean validateInput(String title, String description) {
 223	 if (title == null || title.trim().isEmpty()) {
 224	 errorMessage.setValue("Vui lòng nhập tiêu đề bài hát");
 225	 return false;
 226	 }
 227	 
 228	 if (title.length() > 100) {
 229	 errorMessage.setValue("Tiêu đề quá dài (tối đa 100 ký tự)");
 230	 return false;
 231	 }
 232	 
 233	 if (description != null && description.length() > 500) {
 234	 errorMessage.setValue("Mô tả quá dài (tối đa 500 ký tự)");
 235	 return false;
 236	 }
 237	 
 238	 return true;
 239	}
 240	```

 218	#### Drag-and-Drop Reordering
 219	```java
 220	// PlaylistSongAdapter.java - moveItem()
 221	public void moveItem(int fromPosition, int toPosition) {
 222	 if (fromPosition < toPosition) {
 223	 for (int i = fromPosition; i < toPosition; i++) {
 224	 Collections.swap(songs, i, i + 1);
 225	 }
 226	 } else {
 227	 for (int i = fromPosition; i > toPosition; i--) {
 228	 Collections.swap(songs, i, i - 1);
 229	 }
 230	 }
 231	 notifyItemMoved(fromPosition, toPosition);
 232	 
 233	 if (listener != null) {
 234	 listener.onMoveSong(fromPosition, toPosition);
 235	 }
 236	}
 237	```

 241	// PlaylistSongAdapter.java - showSongMenu()
 242	private void showSongMenu(View anchor, int position) {
 243	 PopupMenu popup = new PopupMenu(context, anchor);
 244	 popup.getMenuInflater().inflate(R.menu.menu_playlist_song, popup.getMenu());
 245	 
 246	 popup.setOnMenuItemClickListener(item -> {
 247	 int itemId = item.getItemId();
 248	 if (itemId == R.id.action_remove_song) {
 249	 if (listener != null) {
 250	 listener.onRemoveSong(song, position);
 251	 }
 252	 return true;
 253	 } else if (itemId == R.id.action_move_up) {
 254	 if (position > 0) {
 255	 moveItem(position, position - 1);
 256	 }
 257	 return true;
 258	 } else if (itemId == R.id.action_move_down) {
 259	 if (position < songs.size() - 1) {
 260	 moveItem(position, position + 1);
 261	 }
 262	 return true;
 263	 }
 264	 return false;
 265	 });
 266	 
 267	 // Enable/disable move options based on position
 268	 popup.getMenu().findItem(R.id.action_move_up).setEnabled(position > 0);
 269	 popup.getMenu().findItem(R.id.action_move_down).setEnabled(position < songs.size() - 1);
 270	 
 271	 popup.show();
 272	}

 385	## Key Design Patterns
 386	
 387	### 1. **MVVM Pattern**
 388	- **View**: Activity handles UI and user interactions
 389	- **ViewModel**: Manages business logic and data state
 390	- **Model**: Repository and Room entities
 391	
 392	### 2. **Observer Pattern**
 393	- LiveData observers for reactive UI updates
 394	- Automatic UI refresh when data changes
 395	
 396	### 3. **Adapter Pattern**
 397	- RecyclerView.Adapter bridges data and UI
 398	- ViewHolder pattern for efficient view recycling
 399	
 400	### 4. **Strategy Pattern**
 401	- Different UI behavior based on ownership
 402	- Conditional visibility and functionality
 403	
 404	## Performance Considerations
 405	
 406	### 1. **Efficient RecyclerView**
 407	- ViewHolder pattern prevents findViewById() calls
 408	- DiffUtil for smart list updates (can be added)
 409	- Image loading with URI caching
 410	
 411	### 2. **Background Operations**
 412	- All database operations on background threads
 413	- ExecutorService in Repository layer
 414	- LiveData handles thread switching
 415	
 416	### 3. **Memory Management**
 417	- Proper cleanup in onCleared()
 418	- Weak references in observers
 419	- Resource cleanup in onDestroy()

 15	/**
 16	 * Utility class for file operations
 17	 * Handles file copying, metadata extraction, and file name operations
 18	 */
 19	public class FileUtils {
 20	 
 21	 private static final String TAG = "FileUtils";
 22	 
 23	 /**
 24	 * Get file name from URI
 25	 */
 26	 public static String getFileName(Context context, Uri uri) {
 27	 String fileName = null;
 28	 
 29	 if (uri.getScheme().equals("content")) {
 30	 try (Cursor cursor = context.getContentResolver().query(uri, null, null, null, null)) {
 31	 if (cursor != null && cursor.moveToFirst()) {
 32	 int nameIndex = cursor.getColumnIndex(OpenableColumns.DISPLAY_NAME);
 33	 if (nameIndex != -1) {
 34	 fileName = cursor.getString(nameIndex);
 35	 }
 36	 }
 37	 } catch (Exception e) {
 38	 Log.e(TAG, "Error getting file name from content URI", e);
 39	 }
 40	 }
 41	 
 42	 if (fileName == null) {
 43	 fileName = uri.getPath();
 44	 if (fileName != null) {
 45	 int cut = fileName.lastIndexOf('/');
 46	 if (cut != -1) {
 47	 fileName = fileName.substring(cut + 1);
 48	 }
 49	 }
 50	 }
 51	 
 52	 return fileName != null ? fileName : "unknown_file";
 53	 }
 54	 
 55	 /**
 56	 * Get file size from URI
 57	 */
 58	 public static long getFileSize(Context context, Uri uri) {
 59	 long size = 0;
 60	 
 61	 if (uri.getScheme().equals("content")) {
 62	 try (Cursor cursor = context.getContentResolver().query(uri, null, null, null, null)) {
 63	 if (cursor != null && cursor.moveToFirst()) {
 64	 int sizeIndex = cursor.getColumnIndex(OpenableColumns.SIZE);
 65	 if (sizeIndex != -1) {
 66	 size = cursor.getLong(sizeIndex);
 67	 }
 68	 }
 69	 } catch (Exception e) {
 70	 Log.e(TAG, "Error getting file size from content URI", e);
 71	 }
 72	 } else if (uri.getScheme().equals("file")) {
 73	 try {
 74	 File file = new File(uri.getPath());
 75	 size = file.length();
 76	 } catch (Exception e) {
 77	 Log.e(TAG, "Error getting file size from file URI", e);
 78	 }
 79	 }
 80	 
 81	 return size;
 82	 }
 83	 
 84	 /**
 85	 * Copy file from URI to internal storage
 86	 */
 87	 public static String copyFileToInternalStorage(Context context, Uri sourceUri, String fileName) {
 88	 try {
 89	 // Create directory for audio files
 90	 File audioDir = new File(context.getFilesDir(), "audio");
 91	 if (!audioDir.exists()) {
 92	 audioDir.mkdirs();
 93	 }
 94	 
 95	 // Create destination file
 96	 File destFile = new File(audioDir, fileName);
 97	 
 98	 // Copy file
 99	 try (InputStream inputStream = context.getContentResolver().openInputStream(sourceUri);
 100	 FileOutputStream outputStream = new FileOutputStream(destFile)) {
 101	 
 102	 if (inputStream != null) {
 103	 byte[] buffer = new byte[4096];
 104	 int bytesRead;
 105	 while ((bytesRead = inputStream.read(buffer)) != -1) {
 106	 outputStream.write(buffer, 0, bytesRead);
 107	 }
 108	 }
 109	 }
 110	 
 111	 return destFile.getAbsolutePath();
 112	 
 113	 } catch (IOException e) {
 114	 Log.e(TAG, "Error copying file to internal storage", e);
 115	 return null;
 116	 }
 117	 }

 119	 /**
 120	 * Get audio duration from file URI
 121	 */
 122	 public static long getAudioDuration(Context context, Uri audioUri) {
 123	 MediaMetadataRetriever retriever = new MediaMetadataRetriever();
 124	 try {
 125	 retriever.setDataSource(context, audioUri);
 126	 String durationStr = retriever.extractMetadata(MediaMetadataRetriever.METADATA_KEY_DURATION);
 127	 if (durationStr != null) {
 128	 return Long.parseLong(durationStr);
 129	 }
 130	 } catch (Exception e) {
 131	 Log.e(TAG, "Error getting audio duration", e);
 132	 } finally {
 133	 try {
 134	 retriever.release();
 135	 } catch (Exception e) {
 136	 Log.e(TAG, "Error releasing MediaMetadataRetriever", e);
 137	 }
 138	 }
 139	 return 0;
 140	 }

 149	 } catch (Exception e) {

 151	 return false;

 168	 /**
 169	 * Format file size to human readable string
 170	 */
 171	 public static String formatFileSize(long bytes) {
 172	 if (bytes < 1024) {
 173	 return bytes + " B";
 174	 } else if (bytes < 1024 * 1024) {
 175	 return String.format("%.1f KB", bytes / 1024.0);
 176	 } else if (bytes < 1024 * 1024 * 1024) {
 177	 return String.format("%.1f MB", bytes / (1024.0 * 1024.0));
 178	 } else {
 179	 return String.format("%.1f GB", bytes / (1024.0 * 1024.0 * 1024.0));
 180	 }
 181	 }

 23	 /**
 24	 * Get file name from URI
 25	 */
 26	 public static String getFileName(Context context, Uri uri) {
 27	 String fileName = null;
 28	 
 29	 if (uri.getScheme().equals("content")) {
 30	 try (Cursor cursor = context.getContentResolver().query(uri, null, null, null, null)) {
 31	 if (cursor != null && cursor.moveToFirst()) {
 32	 int nameIndex = cursor.getColumnIndex(OpenableColumns.DISPLAY_NAME);
 33	 if (nameIndex != -1) {
 34	 fileName = cursor.getString(nameIndex);
 35	 }
 36	 }
 37	 } catch (Exception e) {
 38	 Log.e(TAG, "Error getting file name from content URI", e);
 39	 }
 40	 }
 41	 
 42	 if (fileName == null) {
 43	 fileName = uri.getPath();
 44	 if (fileName != null) {
 45	 int cut = fileName.lastIndexOf('/');
 46	 if (cut != -1) {
 47	 fileName = fileName.substring(cut + 1);
 48	 }
 49	 }
 50	 }
 51	 
 52	 return fileName != null ? fileName : "unknown_file";
 53	 }
 54	 
 55	 /**
 56	 * Get file size from URI
 57	 */
 58	 public static long getFileSize(Context context, Uri uri) {
 59	 long size = 0;
 60	 
 61	 if (uri.getScheme().equals("content")) {
 62	 try (Cursor cursor = context.getContentResolver().query(uri, null, null, null, null)) {
 63	 if (cursor != null && cursor.moveToFirst()) {
 64	 int sizeIndex = cursor.getColumnIndex(OpenableColumns.SIZE);
 65	 if (sizeIndex != -1) {
 66	 size = cursor.getLong(sizeIndex);
 67	 }
 68	 }
 69	 } catch (Exception e) {
 70	 Log.e(TAG, "Error getting file size from content URI", e);
 71	 }
 72	 } else if (uri.getScheme().equals("file")) {
 73	 try {
 74	 File file = new File(uri.getPath());
 75	 size = file.length();
 76	 } catch (Exception e) {
 77	 Log.e(TAG, "Error getting file size from file URI", e);
 78	 }
 79	 }
 80	 
 81	 return size;
 82	 }
 83	 
 84	 /**
 85	 * Copy file from URI to internal storage
 86	 */
 87	 public static String copyFileToInternalStorage(Context context, Uri sourceUri, String fileName) {
 88	 try {
 89	 // Create directory for audio files
 90	 File audioDir = new File(context.getFilesDir(), "audio");
 91	 if (!audioDir.exists()) {
 92	 audioDir.mkdirs();
 93	 }
 94	 
 95	 // Create destination file
 96	 File destFile = new File(audioDir, fileName);
 97	 
 98	 // Copy file
 99	 try (InputStream inputStream = context.getContentResolver().openInputStream(sourceUri);
 100	 FileOutputStream outputStream = new FileOutputStream(destFile)) {
 101	 
 102	 if (inputStream != null) {
 103	 byte[] buffer = new byte[4096];
 104	 int bytesRead;
 105	 while ((bytesRead = inputStream.read(buffer)) != -1) {
 106	 outputStream.write(buffer, 0, bytesRead);
 107	 }
 108	 }
 109	 }
 110	 
 111	 return destFile.getAbsolutePath();
 112	 
 113	 } catch (IOException e) {
 114	 Log.e(TAG, "Error copying file to internal storage", e);
 115	 return null;
 116	 }
 117	 }

 119	 /**
 120	 * Get audio duration from file URI
 121	 */
 122	 public static long getAudioDuration(Context context, Uri audioUri) {
 123	 MediaMetadataRetriever retriever = new MediaMetadataRetriever();
 124	 try {
 125	 retriever.setDataSource(context, audioUri);
 126	 String durationStr = retriever.extractMetadata(MediaMetadataRetriever.METADATA_KEY_DURATION);
 127	 if (durationStr != null) {
 128	 return Long.parseLong(durationStr);
 129	 }
 130	 } catch (Exception e) {
 131	 Log.e(TAG, "Error getting audio duration", e);
 132	 } finally {
 133	 try {
 134	 retriever.release();
 135	 } catch (Exception e) {
 136	 Log.e(TAG, "Error releasing MediaMetadataRetriever", e);
 137	 }
 138	 }
 139	 return 0;
 140	 }

 148	 return mimeType != null && mimeType.startsWith("audio/");
 149	 } catch (Exception e) {
 150	 Log.e(TAG, "Error checking audio file validity", e);
 151	 return false;
 152	 }
 153	 }

 170	 */
 171	 public static String formatFileSize(long bytes) {
 172	 if (bytes < 1024) {
 173	 return bytes + " B";
 174	 } else if (bytes < 1024 * 1024) {
 175	 return String.format("%.1f KB", bytes / 1024.0);
 176	 } else if (bytes < 1024 * 1024 * 1024) {
 177	 return String.format("%.1f MB", bytes / (1024.0 * 1024.0));
 178	 } else {
 179	 return String.format("%.1f GB", bytes / (1024.0 * 1024.0 * 1024.0));
 180	 }
 181	 }

 368	 fileName = fileName.substring(cut + 1);
 369	 }
 370	 }
 371	 }

2. **BaseActivity Pattern**: All activities extend BaseActivity for mini player support
3. **Smart Layout**: Mini player sits between content and bottom navigation
4. **Seamless Navigation**: Tapping mini player opens full PlayerDemoActivity
5. **Mock Data Integration**: Uses same mock data system as full player

### ** Testing Instructions:**

2. **Play Song**: Tap play button on any song in HomeFragment
3. **See Mini Player**: Mini player appears at bottom with song info

 - Close button hides mini player
5. **Expand Player**: Tap mini player area to open full PlayerDemoActivity
6. **Minimize**: In full player, tap minimize to return with mini player visible

- **Reusable Components**: BaseActivity makes mini player easy to add to new screens

- **Apple-like Design**: Consistent with existing design system
- **Well Documented**: Clear comments explaining functionality

- **Comments Screen**: Mini player remains visible when viewing comments
- **Navigation**: Works seamlessly with existing bottom navigation
- **Full Player**: Syncs state when minimizing/expanding
- **Home Screen**: Automatically shows when songs are played

### **Phương pháp 1: Sử dụng Test Button**
1. **Chạy app** - PlayerDemoActivity sẽ mở đầu tiên
2. **Nhìn xuống dưới** - Bạn sẽ thấy button "Test Mini Player" 
3. **Nhấn button** - Nó sẽ:
 - Tạo mock data cho mini player
 - Navigate về MainActivity 
 - Hiển thị mini player ở dưới cùng

### **Phương pháp 2: Sử dụng Chevron Down**
1. **Trong PlayerDemoActivity** - Nhấn nút chevron down (minimize) ở góc trên trái
2. **Kết quả** - Sẽ navigate về MainActivity và hiển thị mini player

### **UI Mini Player sẽ hiển thị:**
- ✅ **Album art nhỏ** (48dp x 48dp) với góc bo tròn
- ✅ **Song title** và **artist name** 
- ✅ **Play/pause button** 
- ✅ **Next button**
- ✅ **Close button** (X)
- ✅ **Progress bar mỏng** ở dưới cùng
- ✅ **Background trắng** với border mỏng
- ✅ **Height 64dp** - không chiếm nhiều không gian

### **Test các tính năng:**
- **Tap vào mini player** → Mở lại PlayerDemoActivity
- **Tap play/pause** → Toggle trạng thái phát
- **Tap next** → Chuyển sang bài khác (mock data)
- **Tap close (X)** → Ẩn mini player

### **Vị trí hiển thị:**
- Mini player sẽ xuất hiện **giữa content và bottom navigation**
- **Persistent** - vẫn hiển thị khi navigate giữa các tab
- **Elevation** - có shadow nhẹ để nổi bật

**Vấn đề tương tự với Library:**
- SearchFragment gốc sử dụng ViewModel phức tạp với LiveData
- Data không hiển thị ngay lập tức
- Observer timing issues

**Giải pháp SearchFragmentSimple:**
✅ **Direct mock data** - 15 bài hát đa dạng thể loại
✅ **Real-time search** - tìm kiếm theo title, genre, description
✅ **Filter chips** - All, Songs, Artists, Playlists (hiện tại chỉ Songs hoạt động)
✅ **Immediate results** - hiển thị data ngay lập tức

### ** Mock Data cho Search (15 bài hát):**

1. **Lofi Chill** - Lofi (LofiMaster)
2. **Future Bass** - Electronic (BassKing)
3. **Guitar Solo** - Acoustic (GuitarHero)
4. **Jazz Night** - Jazz (JazzCat)
5. **Rock Anthem** - Rock (RockStar)
6. **Hip Hop Beat** - Hip-Hop (HipHopKing)
7. **Classical Symphony** - Classical (Maestro)
8. **Pop Sensation** - Pop (PopStar)
9. **Ambient Space** - Ambient (SpaceDreamer)
10. **Country Road** - Country (CountryBoy)
11. **Reggae Vibes** - Reggae (IslandMan)
12. **Blues Soul** - Blues (BluesSinger)
13. **Dance Floor** - Dance (DJMaster)
14. **Indie Dream** - Indie (IndieBand)
15. **Metal Storm** - Metal (MetalHead)

### ** Search Features:**

**Real-time Search:**
- Tìm theo **title**: "jazz" → tìm thấy "Jazz Night"
- Tìm theo **genre**: "rock" → tìm thấy "Rock Anthem"
- Tìm theo **description**: "guitar" → tìm thấy "Guitar Solo", "Rock Anthem"

**UI States:**
- **Initial state**: Hiển thị tất cả bài hát
- **Search results**: Hiển thị kết quả tìm kiếm + số lượng
- **No results**: Hiển thị empty state khi không tìm thấy

**Integration:**
- **Mini Player**: Click play → hiển thị mini player
- **Toast feedback**: Click detail → hiển thị toast
- **Filter chips**: Sẵn sàng mở rộng cho Artists, Playlists

### **✅ Đã cập nhật:**
- **MainActivity** → sử dụng `SearchFragmentSimple`
- **SearchFragmentSimple** → search functionality hoàn chỉnh
- **SongAdapter** → đã có method `updateData()` từ trước

**Bây giờ cả Library và Search đều hoạt động!** 

Test thử:
1. **Library tab** → xem 3 subtabs với nhiều data
2. **Search tab** → gõ "jazz", "rock", "guitar" để test search
3. **Play buttons** → test mini player integration

Cả hai screen giờ đều sử dụng approach đơn giản và hiệu quả như HomeFragment!

 114	## 4\. Kiến trúc Điều hướng Tổng thể
 115	
 116	App theo pattern 1 `Activity` (MainActivity) + nhiều `Fragment` (Home, Search, Library, Profile...) với `BottomNavigationView`.
 117	
 118	**Thanh điều hướng đáy (Bottom Nav Tabs):**
 119	
 120	1. **Home** - feed bài hát mới / từ người theo dõi.
 121	2. **Search** - tìm bài hát, user, playlist.
 122	3. **Library** - nhạc của tôi (My Songs, My Playlists, Liked/Mục đã lưu).
 123	
 124	**Mini Player** cố định ở dưới (trên BottomNav) hoặc dạng bottom sheet expandable sang màn hình Player full.
 125	
 126	**Auth (Login/Register)** nằm trước `MainActivity` (Activity riêng).
